title: (x) Nutella - custom logo {Stephen}
content:
Anybody can tell name and finding of the Nutella font?   
Thanks a lot   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120305231115im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27060.jpg)
author: enri

comments.content:
It's almost surely custom made as most logos are. You could get close   
with [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20120305231115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/bold/testdrive.html?s=neutella&p=72) but you'd need a new 't' and some more weight.
It seems to me, if I remember correctly, that the MM version of Avant Garde offered this weight.
